messages.subject: 47 Ronin Historically Accurate Graphic Novel

messages.messageBody:
Here is the first historically accurate graphic-novel version of the 47 Ronin. http://bit.ly/16zI8kx


Available direct from Shambhala Publications now, and Amazon and bookstores November 5th.


This is our 4th samurai graphic novel and one of many of our Samurai books (http://bit.ly/1fIYnky)
